name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevSecOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development and security integration, specializing in the implementation of **Docker**, **Trivy**, and **Clair** for container security and vulnerability management. Proficient in developing secure CI/CD pipelines using **Harbor**, **ChainGuard**, and **Grype** to ensure compliance with industry standards. Deep expertise in transitioning application configurations with **Bitnami** and adhering to **CIS** benchmarks.

Seasoned in delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Comprehensive experience in both frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in building AI/ML platforms for predictive analytics and automation, with hands-on deployment of cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**.

Adept in compliance-driven development practices aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong foundation in MLOps with a focus on model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
